content:
while other college students are relaxing having cookouts and hitting the lake during Labor Day weekend an OU journalism senior will engage in a breakneck 36hour project designed to reveal the human element of homelessness in Hollywood Fla PERIOD

Emily Summars Sower magazine editorinchief and Sooner yearbook managing editor will participate in the Society of Professional Journalists Will Write for Food internship PERIOD

The program is an annual threeday internship that actakes  college journalists photographers and graphic designers from across the country into the lives of residents of a Florida homeless shelter PERIOD

Once there they will write edit and design a 20page paper that will be sold on the streets of southern Florida the proceeds of which will be donated to the shelter according to the Society of Professional Journalists website PERIOD

The internship is unpaid but transportation room and board are provided according to the Will Write for Food website PERIOD

Summars said when she heard about the internship she wasnt sure she wanted to participate in the intense and chaotic program PERIOD

I am a planner Summars said PERIOD I like to know what is coming which is why I am in journalism where nothing is planned PERIOD It pushes my limits. summars said she decided to participate in the program in order to prepare herself for a career in foreign correspondence PERIOD Summars said she figured if she could survive this experience and do well traveling around the world and reporting in unfamiliar settings would be less daunting PERIOD

Robust news organizations like ours generate civic good that informs improves and inspires communities PERIOD For those invested in OU and Norman OU Daily uniquely has

 Free independent local journalism thats routinely honored at collegiate state and national levels

 The citys largest reporting staff largely drawn from one of the nations top journalism colleges

 A veteran advising staff with a mission to build on our legacy as a launching pad for media professionals

Whether in a onetime donation or a recurring pledge please 
CONTRIBUTE TO OUR MISSION PERIOD
title: Journalism senior to document homelessness in Florida | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
